alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:22AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Norton and northwestern Graham Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 421 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Lenora, or 20 miles northwest of Hill City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lenora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
